column3:
それから……
ミファーの御父上が私達から彼女の事を聞きたいと……
column4:
Mipha's father...I believe he would like to hear more about her.
The least we can do is visit him and offer him
some closure.

column3:
厄災の脅威は去りましたが成さねばならない事や
決して消えない悲しい想いは残されています……
column4:
Although Ganon is gone for now, there is still
so much more for us to do.And so many painful memories that we must bear.

column3:
けれど この国の人々なら きっと昔よりも
素晴らしいハイラルを造る事が出来る……
column4: I believe in my heart, that if all of us work together...we can restore Hyrule to its former glory.

column3:
だから……
私は その助けになりたいのです
column4: Perhaps...even beyond.But it all must start with us.

column3: またその剣の声が聞こえなくなりました
column4: I can no longer hear the voice inside the sword.

column3:
私の力は……
100年の封印で枯れ果てたのかもしれません……
column4:
I suppose it would make sense if my power had
dwindled over the past 100 years...

column3:
でも私……

もう平気です
column4: I'm surprised to admit it...But I can accept that.

column3: 今日は ゾーラの里に向かいます
column4: We'll make our way to Zora's Domain.

column3:
停止している神獣ヴァ・ルッタの状態を把握……

貯水庫の水位を再確認……
column4:
Divine Beast Vah Ruta...looks like it
stopped working.Let's investigate the situation.
